doc.field: - Henley Group Inc said it plans to issue 20 pct of the common stock of its Fisher Scientific Group Inc unit to Henley Group shareholders. The company said it intends to issue one share of Fisher Scientific for each 16 Henley shares held to shareholders of record March 26. The distribution is scheduled for April six, the company also said. It said the Fisher shares will trade in the over-the-counter market under the symbol FSHG.
